We make plots in data science

import library
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

make a dataframe
```{r}
plot_df =
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(100, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(100)
  )
```

make a plot
```{r}
plot_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_point()
```
